text: Dwayne “ The Rock ” Johnson is praising a 10 - year - old boy who saved his 2 - year - old brother from drowning thanks to techniques the older child discovered by watching San Andreas. “ This story grabbed my heart, ” Johnson wrote on Instagram with a screenshot of the news story. Jacob O ’ Connor, 10, found his brother Dylan, 2, lying face down in the family pool.
